CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service for bulk custom access
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow a Glint Admin to apply custom access in bulk through Roles

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service for bulk custom access
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow a Glint Admin to apply custom access in bulk through Roles

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Schedule reports
CurrentVersion.description: The feature enables users to schedule the export of reports on a recurring or on-demand basis. Additionally, users will be notified when the exported report or items are ready for use and download.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Schedule reports
OldVersion.description: The feature enables users to schedule the export of reports on a recurring or on-demand basis. Additionally, users will be notified when the exported report or items are ready for use and download.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Access to M365 header
CurrentVersion.description: Solution displays M365 header in Viva Glint to improve discoverability of other M365 apps

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Access to M365 header
OldVersion.description: Solution displays M365 header in Viva Glint to improve discoverability of other M365 apps

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Automatic data preservation for high-risk users
CurrentVersion.description: Adaptive Protection in Microsoft Purview helps you protect your organization’s data by integrating dynamic insider risk levels, determined by data related activities, with various policy engines to automatically moving users in and out of policies as their risk levels change over time. The integration with Data Lifecycle Management will automatically apply retention labels to preserve deleted emails and files based on a user’s insider risk level.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Automatic data preservation for high-risk users
OldVersion.description: Adaptive Protection in Microsoft Purview helps you protect your organization’s data by integrating dynamic insider risk levels, determined by data related activities, with various policy engines to automatically moving users in and out of policies as their risk levels change over time. The integration with Data Lifecycle Management will automatically apply retention labels to preserve deleted emails and files based on a user’s insider risk level.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Pages - Updated Hero web part with new layout & styles
CurrentVersion.description: The reimagined hero web part will feature a carousel layout and a selection of new styles, creating an eye-catching and engaging experience at the top of the page.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Pages - Updated Hero web part with new layout & styles
OldVersion.description: The reimagined hero web part will feature a carousel layout and a selection of new styles, creating an eye-catching and engaging experience at the top of the page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Improved Report PDF Exports
CurrentVersion.description: PDFs exported from Glint Reports are improved to be easily printable, searchable, and readable.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Improved Report PDF Exports
OldVersion.description: PDFs exported from Glint Reports are improved to be easily printable, searchable, and readable.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Retention Labels are available for Loop pages and components
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations that rely on Microsoft's records management capabilities in Purview can now include Loop content in their workflows with Retention Labels on Loop pages and components. There's an in-app experience when a label is applied or a record is locked.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Retention Labels are available for Loop pages and components
OldVersion.description: Organizations that rely on Microsoft's records management capabilities in Purview can now include Loop content in their workflows with Retention Labels on Loop pages and components. There's an in-app experience when a label is applied or a record is locked.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support S/MIME in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: New Outlook for Windows will support S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail extensions) signing and encryption. All new and existing S/MIME configurations will work without any explicit action from admins. The feature was already available for Web and now we are extending its availability to New Outlook. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Support S/MIME in the new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: New Outlook for Windows will support S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail extensions) signing and encryption. All new and existing S/MIME configurations will work without any explicit action from admins. The feature was already available for Web and now we are extending its availability to New Outlook. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - AI & Copilot Resources provider
CurrentVersion.description: The AI & Copilot Resources provider will power the OOB Microsoft Copilot Academy and will be visible by default to users who have Copilot licenses. Admins will be able to enable, disable, and apply permissions on the content of this provider.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - AI & Copilot Resources provider
OldVersion.description: The AI & Copilot Resources provider will power the OOB Microsoft Copilot Academy and will be visible by default to users who have Copilot licenses. Admins will be able to enable, disable, and apply permissions on the content of this provider.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Copy list of attendees to clipboard
CurrentVersion.description: Allow users to copy the list of attendees to clipboard from calendar event. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Copy list of attendees to clipboard
OldVersion.description: Allow users to copy the list of attendees to clipboard from calendar event. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background for GCC and GCC High environments (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Decorate your background is now available to customers in the GCC and GCC High environments. Decorate your background is a generative background effect in Teams that makes meetings more fun and personal by using AI to spruce up your meeting background. Blend your physical and digital spaces, enabling you to revamp what’s seen of your physical meeting space for each call. This technology allows for effortless room clean-ups, adding virtual plants, or festive decorations for special events. Decorate your background requires a Teams Premium license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background for GCC and GCC environments (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Decorate your background is now available to customers in the GCC and GCC High environments. Decorate your background is a generative background effect in Teams that makes meetings more fun and personal by using AI to spruce up your meeting background. Blend your physical and digital spaces, enabling you to revamp what’s seen of your physical meeting space for each call. This technology allows for effortless room clean-ups, adding virtual plants, or festive decorations for special events. Decorate your background requires a Teams Premium license.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Add emails as attachments while composing an email on Outlook for iOS and Android
CurrentVersion.description: Now while you are composing in Outlook for iOS or Android, you can use the same attach option you already know to select and attach emails to your mail.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Add emails as attachments while composing an email on Outlook for iOS and Android
OldVersion.description: Now while you are composing in Outlook for iOS or Android, you can use the same attach option you already know to select and attach emails to your mail.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Gain DLP policy insights with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot for Security in DLP is capable of summarizing DLP policies. This enhancement enables DLP admins to gain insights on coverage of policies viz. location, classifiers and notifications, and more. 
 
DLP admins can get these insights on all the policies or on few selected policies. They will be able to use prompts to gain a deeper view of how a policy is configured for their digital landscape. This helps them align their data posture on a regular basis and make corrections to policy posture as needed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Gain DLP policy insights with Copilot
OldVersion.description:
Copilot for Security in DLP is capable of summarizing DLP policies. This enhancement enables DLP admins to gain insights on coverage of policies viz. location, classifiers and notifications, and more. 
 
DLP admins can get these insights on all the policies or on few selected policies. They will be able to use prompts to gain a deeper view of how a policy is configured for their digital landscape. This helps them align their data posture on a regular basis and make corrections to policy posture as needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: iPad Multi-Window Support
CurrentVersion.description: Teams now supports multiple windows on iPad. Effortlessly organize your Split View experience with two Teams windows to easily navigate across meetings, chats, and more.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: iPad Multi-Window Support
OldVersion.description: Teams now supports multiple windows on iPad. Effortlessly organize your Split View experience with two Teams windows to easily navigate across meetings, chats, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Forward messages with app cards
CurrentVersion.description: Messages containing app cards in chats and channels can now be forwarded. To use, navigate to the more actions menu of any message containing an app card, and select "Forward".

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Forward messages with app cards
OldVersion.description: Messages containing app cards in chats and channels can now be forwarded. To use, navigate to the more actions menu of any message containing an app card, and select "Forward".

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Read Aloud support added to Copilot chat responses
CurrentVersion.description: Read Aloud capability lets you listen to Copilot responses in the chat pane.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Read Aloud support added to Copilot chat responses
OldVersion.description: Read Aloud capability lets you listen to Copilot responses in the chat pane.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Preview for Pages and News
CurrentVersion.description: This creates Preview mode for authors to view how their Pages and News will look across different device types while editing.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Smart backgrounds for basic plans
CurrentVersion.description: Get ready to customize your plans like never before! With smart backgrounds, you’ll be able to quickly spot the right plans. This feature was part of our legacy Planner experience, and we’re now enabling it for basic plans in the new Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Post and reply to questions as an organizer
CurrentVersion.description: Town hall and webinar organizers now have the ability to post and reply to questions using the title “organizer” in the Q&A experience, instead of their individual names. This feature allows instance organizers to present a unified and official voice when responding to attendee questions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Support for multicloud environments
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, Google Drive, and GitHub. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Fabric risk indicators in Insider Risk Management
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, Insider Risk Management extends its risk detection capabilities to Microsoft Fabric products by offering ready-to-use risk indicators based on activities that may lead to a data security incident in Power BI. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Paste to Browser prevention support on macOS device with endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Endpoint Data Loss Prevention adds support for instances where users try to paste sensitive content into a web browser on macOS devices using Edge, Safari, and other browsers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - MacOS parity for full file evidence
CurrentVersion.description: Data Loss Prevention can copy the item that matches a DLP policy from onboarded MacOS devices to an Azure storage account. This creates full file evidence parity for MacOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Classification improvements on file read access in MacOS devices using Endpoint Data Loss Prevention
CurrentVersion.description: Data classification on files in MacOS devices will be triggered when handling files on read access to improve classification operations.
